import React, { Component } from 'react' import ApiService from '../Service/ApiService' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' export class NormalUser extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) var userdata =JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('userloginmail')) var userLoggedIn =JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('usertoken')) this.state = { taskname:'', taskdescription:'', status:'new', email:userdata.email, isuserlogin:userLoggedIn } } componentDidMount() { } changeHandler=(e)=> { this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } submitTask=(e)=> { e.preventDefault(); const TaskDetail={ taskname :this.state.taskname, taskdescription : this.state.taskdescription, taskstatus:this.state.status, email:this.state.email } ApiService.addTask(TaskDetail).then(res=>{ console.log(res.data.result) }) } render() { var userdata =JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('userloginmail')) var name = userdata.fname.concat(" "+userdata.lname) return (

Welcome
{name} (user)

TaskName TaskDescription
{/* */}
TaskName TaskDescription Status Action
Logout
) } } export default NormalUser
